TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Transaction extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class Transaction Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
type Transaction = class interface IDisposable interface ISerializable

summary.span: 表示交易。

span.span: Represents a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間會提供根據 類別的明確程式撰寫模型 (Programming Model)，以及使用 類別的隱含程式撰寫模型，而其中異動會由基礎結構自動管理。The namespace provides both an explicit programming model based on the class, as well as an implicit programming model using the class, in which transactions are automatically managed by the infrastructure. 我們強烈建議更輕鬆的隱含模型用於開發。We recommend highly that you use the easier implicit model for development. 若要開始，請參閱[實作隱含異動使用異動範圍](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主題。To get started, see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 如需有關如何撰寫交易式應用程式的詳細資訊，請參閱[撰寫交易式應用程式](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/writing-a-transactional-application.md)。For more information on writing a transactional application, see [Writing A Transactional Application](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/writing-a-transactional-application.md). 類別包含實作登記資源管理員的開發人員所使用的方法。The class contains methods used by developers implementing resource managers for enlistment. 它也會提供適用於複製的交易，以及控制目前交易內容的功能。It also provides functionalities for cloning a transaction and controlling the current transaction context. 您可以取得目前的交易，如果其中一個設定，使用靜態屬性。You can obtain the current transaction, if one is set, using the static property.

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

span.span: This type is thread safe.
Participating in a Transaction

summary.span: 建立交易的複製品 (Clone)。

span.span: Creates a clone of the transaction.
A that is a copy of the current transaction object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要傳遞的交易，會建立複製。Clones are created to pass transactions. 例如，您可能不想要傳遞其他應用程式，因為您不想讓其他人認可您的交易。For example, you might not want to pass a to other applications, because you do not want others to commit your transaction. 如果您嘗試封送處理或序列化交易，則會自動為您建立複製。If you try to marshal or serialize a transaction, a clone is created for you automatically.

Public Shared Property Current As Transaction

member this.Current : System.Transactions.Transaction with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定環境交易。

span.span: Gets or sets the ambient transaction.
A that describes the current transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關環境交易的詳細資訊，請參閱的 < 管理交易流程使用 TransactionScopeOption > 一節[實作隱含交易使用交易範圍](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主題。For more information on ambient transactions, please see the "Managing transaction flow using TransactionScopeOption" section of the [Implementing an Implicit Transaction using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 雖然您可以設定使用這個屬性的環境交易，您應該使用物件來管理的環境交易，可能的話。Although you can set the ambient transaction using this property, you should use the object to manipulate the ambient transaction whenever possible. 這個屬性是靜態的執行緒。This property is thread static. 如果您變更環境使用這個屬性內的交易時擲回呼叫時，並會還原先前的環境交易值。If you change the ambient transaction using this property inside a an is thrown when is called, and the previous ambient transaction value is restored.

summary.span: 建立交易的相依複製品。

span.span: Creates a dependent clone of the transaction.
A that represents the dependent clone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相依的交易是的交易的結果取決於所複製之交易的結果。A dependent transaction is a transaction whose outcome depends on the outcome of the transaction from which it was cloned. `cloneoption`參數可控制何種相依交易來建立。The `cloneoption` parameter controls what kind of dependent transaction to create. 如果使用建立相依的交易，它會封鎖交易的認可處理序，直到異動逾時，或是上呼叫。If a dependent transaction is created with , it blocks the commit process of the transaction until the transaction times out, or is called on the . 如果它以建立，它會自動中止交易，如果之前，會呼叫上呼叫。If it is created with , it automatically aborts the transaction if is called before is called on the . ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何建立相依的交易。The following example shows you how to create a dependent transaction. [!code-csharp[Tx_DependentTx#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_dependenttx/cs/dependenttx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Tx_DependentTx#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_dependenttx/vb/dependenttx.vb#1)]

summary.span: 登記長期資源管理員以參與交易。

span.span: Enlists a durable resource manager to participate in a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **附註**這個方法會使用以防止呼叫來自不受信任的程式碼; 不過，只有立即呼叫端需要擁有`FullTrust`權限集合。**Note** This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.

summary.span: 登記支援兩階段交易認可 (Two-Phase Commit) 的長期資源管理員以參與交易。

span.span: Enlists a durable resource manager that supports two phase commit to participate in a transaction.
An object that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用永久性登記資源管理員必須能夠在遇到失敗時執行復原。Resource managers with a durable enlistment must be able to perform recovery if they experience a failure. 如需有關復原的詳細資訊，請參閱[執行復原](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691)。For more information on recovery, see [Performing Recovery](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691). 如需有關暫時性和永久性資源，以及如何登錄資源的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 如需有關資源管理員如何回應認可告知以及準備兩階段交易認可中的認可的詳細資訊，請參閱[認可交易在單一階段和多重階段](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。For more information on how a resource manager responds to commit notification and prepare the commit in two-phase commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d). 透過這個方法有意願參與 「 在交易中編列的資源管理員會收到對應到上定義的方法的兩階段交易認可告知介面。Resource managers enlisted for participation in a transaction through this method receive two phase commit notifications that correspond to the methods defined on the interface.

summary.span: 登記支援單一階段交易認可最佳化的長期資源管理員以參與交易。

span.span: Enlists a durable resource manager that supports single phase commit optimization to participate in a transaction.
An object that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用永久性登記資源管理員必須能夠在遇到失敗時執行復原。Resource managers with a durable enlistment must be able to perform recovery if they experience a failure. 如需有關復原的詳細資訊，請參閱[執行復原](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691)。For more information on recovery, see [Performing Recovery](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d342c5c7-da64-4a4c-8e63-b52f4fbf2691). 如需有關暫時性和永久性資源，以及如何登錄資源的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 請注意，即使您的資源管理員實作登錄使用此方法，但不保證它接收單一階段交易認可。You should note that even when your resource manager implementation enlists with this method, it is not guaranteed that it receives a single phase commit. 交易管理員仍可以改為傳送兩階段交易認可告知。The transaction manager can still send two phase commit notifications instead. 如需有關單一階段交易認可最佳化的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 最佳化使用單一階段交易認可和可提升單一階段告知](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85))。For more information on the single phase commit optimization, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85)).

summary.span: 登記資源管理員，其使用可提升單一階段登記 (PSPE) 而具有內部交易。

span.span: Enlists a resource manager that has an internal transaction using a promotable single phase enlistment (PSPE).

Public Function EnlistPromotableSinglePhase (promotableSinglePhaseNotification As IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification, promoterType As Guid) As Boolean

param.name: promotableSinglePhaseNotification
param.span: 參與者所實作的 介面。

span.span: A interface implemented by the participant.

param.name: promoterType
param.span: 分散式異動處理器的類型。

span.span: The type of the distributed transaction processor.

summary.span: 登記資源管理員，其使用可提升單一階段登記 (PSPE) 而具有內部交易。

span.span: Enlists a resource manager that has an internal transaction using a promotable single phase enlistment (PSPE).

returns.span: 介面實作，可描述此登記。

span.span: A interface implementation that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的值`promoterType`參數是`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`，交易**必須**由 MSDTC 升級並`byte[]`傳回`IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote`方法**必須**是的 MSDTC 交易的傳播權杖。If the value specified for the `promoterType` parameter is `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`, the transaction **must** be promoted by MSDTC and the `byte[]` returned from the `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote` method **must** be an MSDTC transaction propagation token. 如果指定的值`promoterType`參數是**不**`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDTC`，由 MSDTC，，而是只要將呼叫者的實作，將不會升級交易`IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification`。If the value specified for the `promoterType` parameter is **not**`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDTC`, the transaction will not be promoted by MSDTC, but rather by the caller's implementation of `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification`. 如果此呼叫成功，沒有一組後續作業會傳回在交易上`TransactionPromotionException`。If this call is successful, there is a set of subsequent operations on the transaction that will return a `TransactionPromotionException`. 這些作業包括：These operations are: - `Transaction.EnlistDurable` - `TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction` - `TransactionInterop.GetExportCookie` - `TransctionInterop.GetTransmitterPropagationToken` - 交易物件的序列化Serialization of a Transaction object

returns.span: 介面實作，可描述此登記。

span.span: A interface implementation that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在交易中的登記是變動性;也就是說，它們不會存留失敗的參與者。Enlistments in a transaction are volatile; that is, they do not survive the failure of the participant. 此外，這個方法只會建議交易管理員擴大控制，但不是保證擴大規模。In addition, this method only suggests the transaction manager to escalate control, but the escalation itself is not guaranteed. 如果擴大規模會失敗，不會通知使用者，並回復交易。If escalation fails, the user is not notified and the transaction is rolled back. 參數`promotableSinglePhaseNotification`用來與交易管理員通訊的嘗試將 resource manager 的內部交易認可結果。The parameter `promotableSinglePhaseNotification` is used to communicate to the transaction manager the outcome of attempting to commit the resource manager's internal transaction. 如果報告不一致的資料時，交易管理員會擲回例外狀況。If inconsistent data is reported, the transaction manager throws an exception. 如果報告結果之後，交易管理員會尋找在它自己內部的登記的結果通知，並會忽略報告的回應。If an outcome is reported, the transaction manager looks for the outcome notification in its own internal enlistment and ignores the reported response. 如需有關登記與交易的重大問題的詳細資訊，請參閱[交易管理擴大規模](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7)。For more information on enlistments and escalation of a transaction, please see [Transaction Management Escalation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7). 如需 PSPE 的詳細資訊，請參閱[最佳化使用單一階段交易認可和可提升單一階段告知](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85))。For more information on PSPE, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85)). **附註**這個方法會使用以防止呼叫來自不受信任的程式碼; 不過，只有立即呼叫端需要擁有`FullTrust`權限集合。**Note** This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.

summary.span: 登記暫時性 (Volatile) 資源管理員以參與交易。

span.span: Enlists a volatile resource manager to participate in a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變動性資源管理員無法從完成他們所參與的交易失敗中復原。Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating. 如需有關暫時性和永久性資源，以及如何登錄資源的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 如需有關資源管理員如何回應認可告知以及準備認可的詳細資訊，請參閱[認可交易在單一階段和多重階段](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。For more information on how a resource manager responds to commit notification and prepare the commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變動性資源管理員無法從完成他們所參與的交易失敗中復原。Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating. 若要取得的永久性登記在交易中，使用方法。To obtain a durable enlistment in a transaction, use the method. 透過這個方法有意願參與 「 在交易中編列的資源管理員會收到對應到上定義的方法的兩階段交易認可告知介面。Resource managers enlisted for participation in a transaction through this method receive two phase commit notifications that correspond to the methods defined on the interface. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作介面，以及將物件登記在交易中使用的參與者方法。The following example shows an implementation of interface, as well as enlisting the object as a participant in a transaction using the method. [!code-csharp[Tx_Enlist#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/cs/enlist.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Tx_Enlist#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/vb/enlist.vb#1)]

summary.span: 登記支援單一階段交易認可最佳化的暫時性 (Volatile) 資源管理員以參與交易。

span.span: Enlists a volatile resource manager that supports single phase commit optimization to participate in a transaction.
An object that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變動性資源管理員無法從完成他們所參與的交易失敗中復原。Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating. 若要取得的永久性登記在交易中，使用方法。To obtain a durable enlistment in a transaction, use the method. 如需有關暫時性和永久性資源，以及如何登錄資源的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 如需有關資源管理員如何回應認可告知以及準備認可的詳細資訊，請參閱[認可交易在單一階段和多重階段](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。For more information on how a resource manager responds to commit notification and prepare the commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d). 請注意，即使您的資源管理員實作登錄使用此方法，但不保證它接收單一階段交易認可。You should note that even when your resource manager implementation enlists with this method, it is not guaranteed that it receives a single phase commit. 交易管理員仍可以改為傳送兩階段交易認可告知。The transaction manager can still send two phase commit notifications instead. 如需有關單一階段交易認可最佳化的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 最佳化使用單一階段交易認可和可提升單一階段告知](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85))。For more information on the single phase commit optimization, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.0/ms229980(v=vs.85)).

span.span: Implementing A Resource Manager

.method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetPromotedToken() cil managed
Public Function GetPromotedToken () As Byte()

member this.GetPromotedToken : unit -> byte[]

summary.span: 當此交易升級時，取得 Promote 方法傳回的 byte[]。

span.span: Gets the byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

returns.span: 當此交易升級時，Promote 方法傳回的 byte[]。

span.span: The byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法有副作用，如果不升級，導致提升交易。This method has the side effect of causing promotion of the transaction if it is not already promoted. 傳回的格式`byte[]`的值所定義`Transation.PromoterType`屬性。The format of the returned `byte[]` is defined by the value of the `Transation.PromoterType` property. 如果值`Transaction.PromoterType`屬性是`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`或是`Guid.Empty`，則`byte[]`這個方法傳回的是 MSDTC 的傳送者傳播權杖。If the value of the `Transaction.PromoterType` property is `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc` or `Guid.Empty`, then the `byte[]` returned by this method is an MSDTC transmitter propagation token. 任何其他值`Transaction.PromoterType`屬性指定的呼叫端所定義的格式`Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`，指定屬性型別值。Any other value for the `Transaction.PromoterType` property specifies a format that is defined by the caller of `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` that specified the property type value. 若要解譯升級語彙基元在此後者的情況下，您必須參考說明文件所做的程式碼以`EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`呼叫。In order to interpret the promoted token in this latter case, you will need to consult the documentation for the code that made the `EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` call.

summary.span: 取得交易的隔離等級 (Isolation Level)。

span.span: Gets the isolation level of the transaction.

value.span: 其中一個 值，指出交易的隔離等級。

span.span: One of the values that indicates the isolation level of the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 交易的隔離等級決定何種其他交易對交易之前的變動性資料的存取層級完成。The isolation level of a transaction determines what level of access other transactions have to volatile data before a transaction completes. 如需有關隔離等級的詳細資訊，請參閱文件列舉型別。For more information about isolation levels, see the documentation for the enumeration.

summary.span: 提升和登記支援兩階段交易認可 (Two-Phase Commit) 的長期資源管理員以參與異動。

span.span: Promotes and enlists a durable resource manager that supports two phase commit to participate in a transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: public Guid PromoterType { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Guid PromoterType
Public ReadOnly Property PromoterType As Guid
public: property Guid PromoterType { Guid get(); };
member this.PromoterType : Guid

summary.span: 可唯一識別 byte[] 的格式，其由 Promote 方法在交易升級時傳回。

span.span: Uniquely identifies the format of the byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

value.span: 可唯一識別格式的 guid byte []交易升級時，Promote 方法傳回。

span.span: A guid that uniquely identifies the format of the byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果交易尚未升級，且還沒有可提升單一階段登記，這個屬性的值會`Guid.Empty`。If the transaction has not yet been promoted and does not yet have a promotable single phase enlistment, the value of this property will be `Guid.Empty`. 如果交易已經變更或將會升級為 MSDTC，則這個屬性的值會是`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`。If the transaction has been or will be promoted to MSDTC, then the value of this property will be `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`. 如果交易已經過，或將非 MSDTC promoter 所升級，這個屬性的值會以先前呼叫所指定的值`Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`。If the transaction has been or will be promoted by a non-MSDTC promoter, the value of this property will be the value specified to an earlier call to `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`.

summary.span: 復原 (中止) 交易。

span.span: Rolls back (aborts) the transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Rollback ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Rollback() cil managed
Public Sub Rollback ()
public: void Rollback();
member this.Rollback : unit -> unit

summary.span: 復原 (中止) 交易。

span.span: Rolls back (aborts) the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 交易物件的任何複本可以起始交易的復原，藉由呼叫這個方法。Any copy of a transaction object can initiate the rollback of the transaction by calling this method. 只有原始交易物件，也就是物件，可用來起始嘗試認可交易。Only the original transaction object, which is a object, can be used to initiate an attempt to commit the transaction. 尚未決定交易的結果之後，會呼叫這個方法時，會擲回例外狀況。An exception is thrown when this method is called after the outcome of the transaction has already been determined.

summary.span: 設定非 MSDTC Promoter 所產生的分散式異動識別碼。

span.span: Sets the distributed transaction identifier generated by the non-MSDTC promoter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只能成功呼叫而`IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote`正在處理方法。This method can only be called successfully while the `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote` method is being processed. 如果在任何其他的時間，會呼叫這個方法`TransactionException`就會擲回。If this method is called at any other time, a `TransactionException` is thrown. 指定的值`promotableNotification`參數必須是相同的物件，原先指定為`Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`引動過程。The specified value of the `promotableNotification` parameter must be the same object that was originally specified to the `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` invocation. 如果這不是如此，則`InvalidOperationException`就會擲回。If this is not the case, then an `InvalidOperationException` is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Transactions.TransactionCompletedEventHandler TransactionCompleted;
.event class System.Transactions.TransactionCompletedEventHandler TransactionCompleted
Public Custom Event TransactionCompleted As TransactionCompletedEventHandler
public: event System::Transactions::TransactionCompletedEventHandler ^ TransactionCompleted;
member this.TransactionCompleted : System.Transactions.TransactionCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 指出交易已完成。

span.span: Indicates that the transaction is completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以註冊這個事件，而不使用變動性登記來取得交易的結果資訊。You can register for this event instead of using a volatile enlistment to get outcome information for transactions. 將參數傳遞給委派是執行個體。The parameter passed to the delegate is a instance. 然後，您可以查詢要取得的執行個體的特定執行個體的屬性，其屬性包含與交易的狀態或值。You can then query the property of the specific instance to get an instance of , whose property contains the status of a transaction with either the or value. **注意：** 註冊此事件造成負面影響它附加到交易的效能。**Caution** Signing up for this event negatively affects the performance of the transaction it is attached to. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何應用程式時，可以藉由訂閱取得交易結果的事件。The following sample shows how an application can obtain the outcome of a transaction by subscribing to the event. [!code-csharp[Tx_Outcome#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_outcome/cs/txoutcome.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Tx_Outcome#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_outcome/vb/txoutcome.vb#1)]

exception.span: 嘗試在已經處置的交易上訂閱這個事件。

span.span: An attempt to subscribe this event on a transaction that has been disposed.
